Additional Resources

Overviews of Connected Learning

  • Connected Learning: An Agenda for Research and Design is the white paper that started it all.

  • The DML Research Hub is at the center of connected learning research.

  • The Connected Learning Alliance provides many connected learning resources and examples.

  • In Connected Libraries: Surveying the Current Landscape and Charting the Path to the Future, we introduce ConnectedLib and discuss why libraries are such great places for connected learning.

Promoting Equity

  • Ready to Code: Connecting Youth to CS Opportunity Through Libraries, by Linda Braun & Marijke Visser.
